English version in below

◎時間：

2024/7/8-2024/7/15

◎地點：Universitas Negeri Surabaya (UNESA), Indonesia

◎費用：

IDR 2,500,000 約新台幣5,000 （費用中含宿舍、活動期間的膳食和茶點、活動的交通/住宿安排、包含Unesa暑期營商品的優質好禮袋）

◎報名時間：2024.5.9截止

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

在學證明
家長同意書   (下載範本Form：海外短期交流家長同意書)
填寫google 表單向姐妹校報名：https://unesa.me/USC24Application
國際處會協助提名給主辦單位
等待姐妹校的通知
欲知詳情，請詳閱附件或官網：
https://oia.unesa.ac.id/

注意事項：

國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。
English version

◎Period：

2024/7/8-2024/7/15

◎Location：Universitas Negeri Surabaya (UNESA), Indonesia

◎Fee：

IDR 2,500,000 around NTD 5,000

（Price includes Dormitory, Meals and Refreshments during the event, Transportation/Accommodation for Activities, Goodie Bag of Unesa Summer Camp Merchandise.)

◎Registration Deadline：Until 2024.5.9

1.Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

Student Status Certificate
Parental Consent Letter(Form：Parental Consent Letter)
2. Complete the registration via: https://unesa.me/USC24Application

3. The OIA will assist in the nomination process

4. Await the announcement from UNESA

For further information, please check the attached file, watch the linked video or visit their website.
https://oia.unesa.ac.id/

Please note:

The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
